definitions.definition: Historical quality or authenticity based on fact.
examples: The historicity of minor political figures of this period is often hard to establish due to a dearth of sources.

definitions.definition: The characteristic of having appeared or developed in history , as opposed to being natural or universal .
examples: This particular school places great emphasis on the historicity of ideas, practices, or institutions.

main_definition: Historical quality or authenticity based on fact.
secondary_definitions: ( philosophy ) The characteristic of having appeared or developed in history , as opposed to being natural or universal .
